articles.title: Japanese Yen slides to near two-week low against USD ahead of BoJ policy decision - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) drifts lower for the sixth straight day on Tuesday and weakens to a nearly two-week low against its American counterpart during the Asian session.
articles.content:
